00009 #include "LowpassFunction.h"
00010 
00011 
00012 LowpassFunction::LowpassFunction()
00013         : FunctionUnit("function.lowpass")
00014 {
00015         registerAttribute(TT("coefficient"), kTypeFloat64, &attrCoefficient, (TTSetterMethod)&LowpassFunction::setCoefficient); 
00016         registerMessage(TT("clear"), (TTMethod)&LowpassFunction::clear);
00017         
00018         // Set Defaults...
00019         setAttributeValue(TT("coefficient"), 0.75);
00020         sendMessage(TT("clear"));
00021 }
00022 
00023 LowpassFunction::~LowpassFunction()
00024 {
00025         ;
00026 }
00027 
00028 
00029 double LowpassFunction::map(double x)
00030 {
00031         feedback = antiDenormal((feedback * attrCoefficient) + (x * one_minus_coefficient));
00032         return feedback;
00033 }
00034 
00035 
00036 TTErr LowpassFunction::clear()
00037 {
00038         feedback = 0.0;
00039         return kTTErrNone;
00040 }
00041 
00042 
00043 TTErr LowpassFunction::setCoefficient(const TTValue& newValue)
00044 {
00045         attrCoefficient = newValue;
00046         one_minus_coefficient = 1.0 - attrCoefficient;
00047         return kTTErrNone;
00048 }
